description: Table generated with SQL query file time_on_task.sql using the simeon CLI tool. It tracks the analytics about the amount of time spent on course items that are deemed tasks. These tasks include the sheer use of the course contents, along with interactions with videos, problems, forums, and textbooks/wikis.
